RAW_FOLDER_NOT_FOUND: Raw folder path does not exist
RAW_FOLDER_INVALID_NAME: Raw media naming does not match numeric prefix rule
RAW_FOLDER_DUPLICATE_LESSON: Multiple media files found for same lesson key
INVALID_STATUS: Status is not in allowed state set
INVALID_STEP: Step is not in allowed pipeline steps
ASR_NOT_READY: ASR output is placeholder; provide real transcript before translation
